items.content_text: <p>I need to find a better git workflow for posts. Currently posts published through my <a href="https://github.com/benjifs/micropub">micropub endpoint</a> are pushed to a branch. That branch gets automatically deployed to preview on Netlify. On a push...
items.content_html: <p>I need to find a better git workflow for posts. Currently posts published through my <a href="https://github.com/benjifs/micropub">micropub endpoint</a> are pushed to a branch. That branch gets automatically deployed to preview on Netlify. On a push to <code>main</code>, a GitHub Action deploys to &quot;production&quot;. I manually deploy changes when a post is made after I've previewed and &quot;approved&quot; them but doing a PR for all of these seems like overkill but that might be the way to go for now.</p>

items.content_text: <p>Added a few more pages. You can now read some info <a href="/about">about me</a>, see what devices I <a href="/uses">use</a>, and a <a href="/changelog">changelog</a> for this site.</p>

items.content_text: <p>This feels like a minor thing that I might not use often but I added a way to temporary delete posts by &quot;marking&quot; them deleted in my <a href="https://github.com/benjifs/micropub">micropub endpoint</a>. Eleventy then renders a...
items.content_html: <p>This feels like a minor thing that I might not use often but I added a way to temporary delete posts by &quot;marking&quot; them deleted in my <a href="https://github.com/benjifs/micropub">micropub endpoint</a>. Eleventy then renders a &quot;post deleted&quot; page for that post</p>

items.content_text: <p>I moved the short link functions to its own eleventy plugin and released it to npm. It cleaned up a few things on my end but mostly I was hoping it would be beneficial to somebody else. <a...
items.content_html: <p>I moved the short link functions to its own eleventy plugin and released it to npm. It cleaned up a few things on my end but mostly I was hoping it would be beneficial to somebody else. <a href="https://npmjs.com/package/eleventy-plugin-shortlinks">eleventy-plugin-shortlinks</a></p>

items.content_text: <p>Last <a href="https://indieweb.org/Homebrew_Website_Club">Homebrew Website Club</a> meeting was really helpful to figure out a way to handle deleting content. I doubt I'll be using that feature much but thought it was worth the add.</p>
